successes.title: meta: The Most Advanced Augmented Reality Glasses

Pledges.description: Thank you for supporting us! We will keep you in the loop via our email updates, metaScoops.

Receive an exclusive membership to our developer forums and contribute input to how our next generation should be designed. You'll also get early access to our 3D app store, and we will keep you in the loop via our email updates, metaScoops.

Receive a limited-edition pair of meta sunglasses. Plus, receive an exclusive membership to our developer forums and contribute input to how our next generation should be designed, get early access to our 3D app store, and we will keep you in the loop via our email updates, metaScoops.

A ticket to our San Francisco or New York public launch party. You'll get to try out our hardware in person and experience the most advanced augmented reality apps in the world. You'll also receive an exclusive membership to our developer forums and contribute input to how our next generation should be designed. You'll also get early access to our 3D app store, and we will keep you in the loop via our email updates, metaScoops.

Get in the front of the line for the next generation of meta. Plus, receive an early bird's special game for use with our next generation of meta (which will be targeting the mass consumer market, and be ready to market next year), a limited-edition pair of meta sunglasses, an exclusive membership to our developer forums and contribute input to how our next generation should be designed, get early access to our 3D app store, and we will keep you in the loop via our email updates, metaScoops.

Early Bird Special: The meta 1 Developer Kit: Grab hold of the future with see through AR Glasses, a Depth Camera, our SDK and example applications. You'll also receive exclusive access to developer forums and early bird access to our consumer edition.

Early Bird 2: The meta 1 Developer Kit: Grab hold of the future with see through AR Glasses, a Depth Camera, our SDK and example applications. You'll also receive exclusive access to developer forums and early bird access to our consumer edition.

LAST MINUTE SPECIAL: The meta 1 Developer Kit: Grab hold of the future with see through AR Glasses, a Depth Camera, our SDK and example applications. You'll also receive exclusive access to developer forums and early bird access to our consumer edition.

The meta 1 Developer Kit: metaMann edition (celebrating Steve Mann joining us as Chief Scientist) Grab hold of the future with see through AR Glasses, a Depth Camera, our SDK and the example applications you've seen in our video. You'll also receive exclusive access to developer forums and early bird access to our consumer edition.

The meta 1 Developer Kit: Grab hold of the future with see through AR Glasses, a Depth Camera, our SDK and the example applications you've seen in our video. You'll also receive exclusive access to developer forums and early bird access to our consumer edition.

The meta 1 Developer Kit: Grab hold of the future with see through AR Glasses, a Depth Camera, our SDK and the example applications you've seen in our video. You'll also receive exclusive access to developer forums and early bird access to our consumer edition.

Join the team for dinner in NY. Of course, also be among the first to receive a meta 1 developer kit. You will also have access to a full suite of sample apps to help inspire you. Plus, get in the front of the line for the next generation of meta, receive an early bird's special game for use the next generation of meta, a limited-edition pair of meta sunglasses, an exclusive membership to our developer forums and contribute input to how our next generation should be designed, get early access to our 3D app store, and we will keep you in the loop via our email updates, metaScoops.

Join us for a private dinner and launch party with the team in New York. Of course, also be among the first to receive a meta 1 developer kit. You will also have access to a full suite of sample apps to help inspire you. Plus, get in the front of the line for the next generation of meta, receive an early bird's special game for use with the next generation of meta, a limited-edition pair of meta sunglasses, an exclusive membership to our developer forums and contribute input to how our next generation should be designed, get early access to our 3D app store, and we will keep you in the loop via our email updates, metaScoops.

2 Day App Building Consult with the meta team. We'll build your app with you from our Office in San Francisco, over two full days. Use our expertise in Unity 3D and computer vision. Three of our team members will code alongside you and help you bring your vision to life.
